src:
5 Tempat Makan Daging Panggang ala Amerika Latin yang Memuaskan
02 Nov 2019, 11:00 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Daging panggang tak hanya dari Jepang dan Korea saja. Ada daging panggang ala Amerika Latin yang wajib dicoba.Daging panggang ala Jepang (yakiniku) dan Korea memang sudah menjamur, namun ada daging panggang dari negara lain yang tak kalah enak. Adalah negara-negara di Amerika Latin seperti Meksiko, Argentina, dan Brazil yang memiliki olahan daging panggang enak.Varian daging panggangnya lebih beragam dengan saus cocolan yang berbeda. Penasaran? Mampir saja ke 5 tempat makan daging panggang ala Amerika Latin berikut.1. Sudestada


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: Instagram ericekosMau cicip daging panggang ala Argentina? Mampirlah ke Sudestada di kawasan Thamrin. Pemiliknya adalah Victor Taborda, chef asli Argentina. Beragam hidangan panggang ala Argentina disebut asado. Salah satu yang bisa dicoba adalah Bife de Chorizo.Berupa striploin yang dislow cook kemudian dipanggang hingga permukaan luarnya renyah. Ada juga matambre yang sayang dilewatkan. Matambre memakai daging bagian antara iga dan kulit sapi (rose meat). Potongannya sedikit lebih tipis dengan rasa yang sama gurih enaknya. Semua daging panggang ini lalu dicocol chimichurri yang harum aromatik.Sudestada Grill, Bar & CafeJl. Irian No.18, Thamrin, JakartaTelepon: 0813 31265567Baca Juga: Chorizo hingga Daging Panggang Argentina Autentik Ada di Resto Ini 2. Fogo


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: Instagram fogo.jktFogo tengah hits di media sosial karena sajian daging panggang ala Brazil buatan mereka. Daging panggang ini tersedia dalam paket bersantap All You Can Eat (AYCE). Harga bersantapnya terjangkau sekitar Rp 125.000++.Pilihan dagingnya banyak dan beberapa akan diirisi di depan pengunjung. Yang bisa dicoba adalah Peri Peri Beef dengan rasa agak pedas, Honey Glaze Beef, dan Garlic Beef. Makin enak saat daging panggang dicocol ke beragam saus seperti chimichurri, dabu-dabu, BBQ, dan saus sambal. Menu buffetnya juga beragam seperti spaghetti, chicken wing, dan salad.FogoIntiland Tower, Jl. Jend. Sudirman No. 32Bendungan HilirTelepon: 021 579060003. Tucano's Churrascaria


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: dok. detikFoodTucano's Churrascaria juga tawarkan daging panggang Brazil sepuasnya atau AYCE. Andalan restoran berupa churrasco atau daging panggang yang memakai skewer atau tusukan. Terdapat berbagai pilihan potongan daging untuk menu churrasco.Beberapa menu yang bisa dicoba adalah Picanha (top sirloin), Alcatra (sirloin), Fraldinha (outside skirt), Carnero (domba), ayam, udang dan sosis. Selain churrasco, pengunjung juga bisa menikmati makanan tradisional Brasil di meja prasmanan. Harga bersantapnnya mulai dari Rp 168.000++ untuk makan siang dan Rp 238.000++ untuk makan malam.Tucano's ChurrascariaPavilion Retail Arcade Lantai DasarJl. KH Mas MansyurSudirmanTelepon: 021 80602045 ext:522Baca Juga: Di Restoran Ini Anda Bisa Nonstop Makan BBQ Daging Gaya Brasil 4. El Asador


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: Instagram the.lucky.bellyDaging panggang Amerika Selatan yang gurih juicy juga tersedia di El Asador. Jenis dagingnya beragam seperti ribeye bone in, chorizo, dan vacio. Makin enak ditambah saus BBQ, pepper, chimuchurri, dan salsa croilla. Tersedia dalam pilihan ala carte dan AYCE.Harga bersantap AYCE di sini mulai dari Rp 430.000. Bisa pilih juga satu tambahan pelengkap seperti mashed potato, Russian salad, atau kentang goreng. Kalau mau pilihan daging premium seperti tenderloin, sirloin, dan ribeye, paket AYCE-nya seharga Rp 590.000.El AsadorKemang Point Building, Lantai Ground, Jl. Kemang Raya, KemangTelepon: 021 71822065. El Machote


Foto: Istimewa

Foto: Instagram elmachotejakartaSteak gaya Amerika Selatan tersedia di El Machote. Tersedia menia Churrasco (rib eye), Picanha (rump steak), Pork/ Lamb Chorizo (sausage), Pollo el Machote (chicken leg), Lamb Chop maupun Salmon. Di sini juga ada smoked meat seperti Suckling Pig, Smoked Chicken, Beef Ribs hingga Smoked Corn.Untuk harga churrasco sekitar Rp 240.000 per 200 gram. Sementara picanha harganya mulai dari Rp 210.000 per 200 gram. Jangan lupa juga cicip tenderloin yang enak di sini.El MachoteJl. K.H. Wahid Hasyim No. 57, MentengTelepon: 0819 32355830Simak Video "Pedas Menantang Nasi Bebek Khas Madura Pak Munawi"[Gambas:Video 20detik](adr/odi)
text:
5 satisfying places to eat grilled Latin American meat
02 Nov 2019, 11:00 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - Grilled meat is not only from Japan and Korea. There is a Latin American-style grilled meat that must be tried. Japanese-style grilled meat (akiniku) and Korea have mushroomed, but there are grilled meats from other countries that are no less tasty. Are countries in Latin America such as Mexico, Argentina, and Brazil that have delicious processed meat. Variants of grilled meat are more diverse with different dipping sauces. Curious? Just stop by the 5 places to eat Latin American-style grilled meat follows. Sudestada


Photo: Special

Photo: Instagram ericekosDo you want to taste the Argentinean grilled meat? Stop by Sudestada in the Thamrin area. The owner is Victor Taborda, a native Argentine chef. Various Argentinean grilled dishes are called asado. One thing you can try is Bife de Chorizo. It is a striploin that is dislow cook and then baked until the outside surface is crisp. There is also a matambre that is unfortunately missed. Matambre uses the meat between the ribs and cow skin (rose meat). The slice is a little thinner with the same delicious taste. All this roasted meat is then smoked with aromatic chimichurri. Sudestada Grill, Bar & CafeJl. Irian No.18, Thamrin, Jakarta Phone: 0813 31265567 Also Read: Chorizo to Authentic Argentinean Roast Be in This Resto 2. Fogo


Photo: Special

Photo: Instagram fogo.jktFogo is being hit on social media because of their Brazilian-style barbecued meat. This grilled meat is available in the All You Can Eat (AYCE) dining package. Affordable dining prices around Rp 125,000 ++, a large selection of meat and some will be filled in front of visitors. What you can try are Peri Peri Beef with a slightly spicy taste, Honey Glaze Beef, and Garlic Beef. The more delicious when roasted meat dipped into a variety of sauces such as chimichurri, dabu-dabu, BBQ, and chili sauce. The buffet menu is also as varied as spaghetti, chicken wing and salad. FogoIntiland Tower, Jl. Jend. Sudirman No. 32Bendungan HilirPhone: 021 579060003. Tucano's Churrascaria


Photo: Special

Photo: dock. detikFoodTucano's Churrascaria also offers unlimited Brazilian roast or AYCE. The mainstay of the restaurant is a churrasco or grilled meat that uses skewer or prick. There are various choices of cuts of meat for the churrasco. menu. Some menus that can be tried are Picanha (top sirloin), Alcatra (sirloin), Fraldinha (outside skirt), Carnero (lamb), chicken, shrimp and sausages. In addition to Churrasco, visitors can also enjoy traditional Brazilian food at the buffet table. Dining prices start at Rp 168,000 ++ for lunch and Rp 238,000 ++ for dinner. Tacano's Churrascaria Pavillion Retail Arcade Ground Floor Jl. KH Mas MansyurSudirmanPhone: 021 80602045 ext: 522Read Also: At This Restaurant You Can Nonstop Eat BBQ Meat Brazilian Style 4. El Asador


Photo: Special

Photo: Instagram the.lucky.belly Juicy, savory South American roast is also available at El Asador. Various types of meat such as ribeye bone in, chorizo, and vacio. The more delicious plus BBQ sauce, pepper, chimuchurri, and salsa croilla. Available in ala carte and AYCE options. AYCE dining prices here start from IDR 430,000. You can also choose additional supplements such as mashed potatoes, Russian salads, or french fries. If you want premium meat choices such as tenderloin, sirloin, and ribeye, the AYCE package costs Rp. 590,000. El Asador Kemang Point Building, Ground Floor, Jl. Kemang Raya, Kemang Phone: 021 71822065. El Machote


Photo: Special

Photo: Instagram elmachotejakarta A South American style speaker is available at El Machote. Available menia Churrasco (rib eye), Picanha (rump steak), Pork / Lamb Chorizo (sausage), Pollo el Machote (chicken leg), Lamb Chop or Salmon. Here there are also smoked meats such as Suckling Pig, Smoked Chicken, Beef Ribs to Smoked Corn. For the price of a churrasco around Rp 240,000 per 200 grams. While panicas start from Rp. 210,000 per 200 grams. Don't forget to taste the delicious tenderloin here. El MachoteJl. K.H. Wahid Hasyim No. 57, Menteng Phone: 0819 32355830 Watch Video "Spicy Challenging Pak Munawi's Madura Duck Rice" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (adr / odi)
